sections.heading: Sections; variance, evasion, and waiver; prohibited
sections.text: Except as expressly provided in sections 76-825 to 76-894, provisions of sections 76-825 to 76-894 may not be varied by agreement, and rights conferred by sections 76-825 to 76-894 may not be waived. A declarant may not act under a power of attorne
